news.image_caption: November 2020 Ask Me Anything next week
news.content:
It's a chance to ask the ThreeFold Foundation Team any questions you might have.

Please send us your questions in advance via email to info@threefold.io¬†or in this forum topic. üôè

Zoom Link Meeting ID: 850 3132 9163

Google Calendar Event The room will open 10 minutes prior to the call!

Take a look at Monday's Community Call for recent updates here.

& please spread the word!
news.excerpt: ThreeFold will be hosting an Ask Me Anything on Tuesday November 10 at 5pm CET!

previous.title: Harmony Integrates with ThreeFold‚Äôs Decentralized Grid
previous.excerpt: Harmony and ThreeFold will work together on developer and user projects on the ThreeFold Grid and Pangaea..

next.title: Dash & Dash NEXT partners with ThreeFold
next.excerpt: Dash, Dash NEXT and the ThreeFold Foundation are excited to officially announce their collaboration, effective the end of June 2020.
